0.text: We use the modal "can" to talk about ability.
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>We <break time='200ms'/> use <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> modal <break time='200ms'/> "can" <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> talk <break time='200ms'/> about <break time='200ms'/> ability. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: Make questions and sentences using the table.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Make <break time='200ms'/> questions <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> sentences <break time='200ms'/> using <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> table. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: I We You They He/ She/ It
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>I <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> You <break time='200ms'/> They <break time='200ms'/> He/ <break time='200ms'/> She/ <break time='200ms'/> It <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.text: Match the sentences with the pictures.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Match <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> sentences <break time='200ms'/> with <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> pictures. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: 1) Rama can dance well. 2) We can't understand the question. 3) Can dogs swim? Yes, they can. 4) Can Sandun drive a car? Yes, he can. 5) Ramani can run fast. 6) Cats can climb trees.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1) <break time='200ms'/> Rama <break time='200ms'/> can <break time='200ms'/> dance <break time='200ms'/> well. <break time='200ms'/> 2) <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> can't <break time='200ms'/> understand <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> question. <break time='200ms'/> 3) <break time='200ms'/> Can <break time='200ms'/> dogs <break time='200ms'/> swim? <break time='200ms'/> Yes, <break time='200ms'/> they <break time='200ms'/> can. <break time='200ms'/> 4) <break time='200ms'/> Can <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sand̪əni'>Sandun</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> drive <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> car? <break time='200ms'/> Yes, <break time='200ms'/> he <break time='200ms'/> can. <break time='200ms'/> 5) <break time='200ms'/> Ramani <break time='200ms'/> can <break time='200ms'/> run <break time='200ms'/> fast. <break time='200ms'/> 6) <break time='200ms'/> Cats <break time='200ms'/> can <break time='200ms'/> climb <break time='200ms'/> trees. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
